Reviews.Title: “RESORT? NO! Roach Motel? YES! - anyone rating 5 stars works there”
Reviews.Author: XLisaC
Reviews.Content: We decided to extend our vaca one day and stay in Daytona Beach. We found this "resort" and booked it for a "reasonable" rate.It was filthy! We go into out room and the floor was full of chipped paint and compound from the popcorn ceiling. Even the AC unit was filled with it. We called the front desk to inform them and the maintenance came up, dropped the vacuum off then looked at us and said "Oh! I have to clean it?" ARE YOU SERIOUS??!! The bedsheets were gross. I had to buy Lysol and saturate the beds before I'd even lay in them. The carpet was matted and dirty. The bathroom was filled with rust and mold. The door lock were even halfway off the hinges. This place is disgusting! DO NOT STAY HERE! I have additional pictures as proof.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place!”
Reviews.Author: Artie F
Reviews.Content: I have stayed in this hotel for ten years now on Labor Day my family and I love the hotel and the staff! The rooms are very clean and affordable. The outdoor bar is great and of course the beach and pool are right at the hotel. Breakfast is great love the service and great parking. This a a great getaway for the family!

Reviews.Title: “You can do better.”
Reviews.Author: Meluhknee
Reviews.Content: For paying as much as we did for the rooms, we expected WAY better. During my two night stay, I killed a total of 7 roaches. That's 7 too many. I was so disgusted with our room. The mini fridge that was in our room was dirty. The sheets that were on our bed were stained. The room had a moldy, old smell to it. The only thing I loved about this place was the staff and the Bonkerz Comedy Club inside the hotel on the 10th floor. They hired some HILARIOUS comedians and had some good drink specials, but that still doesn't cancel out the fact the hotel looked like it was falling apart. It really needs to be renovated.

Reviews.Title: “It's a subpar hotel- if you were only paying 10$ a night!”
Reviews.Author: Tinatini
Reviews.Content: Was booked in for two weeks. Left after one. First impressions: carpets when you walk in are WET. Don't ask me how, but the 80's carpets are just drenched. That's disgusting. Flip flops or shoes needed all day. Stayed on the 8th floor. Very loud weekend, quiet during the week. Rooms a very dirty. Bugs. Lots of small ants now moved into our luggege. Pretty gross but thankfully not cockroaches. Thankfully the beds were pretty comfortable and we only went to the room to sleep and shower. I was locked out of the room for an hour. Not because I forgot my room key, but because the door card reader needed replacement during my stay. In dire need of maintence. If they renovated EVERYTHING, it would be worth 59$ a night like I paid. In conclusion, tolerable but just barely. Place is filthy and smells bad. Mold. Did I forget to mention the dozen of hidden fees?

Reviews.Title: “LaPlaya not up to par!”
Reviews.Author: Larry342
Reviews.Content: We were booked into the LaPlaya by the Preferred Guest Travel Agency on a vacation package my wife purchased and the place appears to be falling apart. Fortunately, I asked to see our room before checking in and we looked at 3 rooms before checking in. The tile walkway in front of our last room was coming up and maintenance had to place a couple of red cones over it. The next morning there were ants coming out from between the base board and the carpet, not one or two but lots of ants. After 2 tries maintenance was able to get rid of them. When I went to the restaurant, the upholstery in my booth was stained, worn out and had tares in the upholstery. The chairs at the adjoining table were had stains on them as well. Basically, the place seemed to be falling apart but the staff was very nice and tried very had to take care of our concerns, especially the maintenance guy.

Reviews.Title: “Family night and day at the beach.”
Reviews.Author: keithsnumber2
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed somewhere on Daytona Beach on Friday and decided that we should find a cheap hotel/motel and bring the kids to the beach for a day before they start a new school year. Our original plan was to find a cheap room near the beach with a pool to rent on Sunday so that we could eat without sand in the cooler, have an unshared bathroom and be able to get out of the sun if the little one needed a break/nap. Before we picked the cheapest place to stay we decided to check out a couple places in a guide book we found outside of a gas station that rates the were "too good to be true." After checking out five places, we went back to LaPlaya (which was place #3 that we checked out) and rented the room for Saturday night and asked about late check-out times. They didn't guarantee a late check out time so we were hoping one would be available, if not, we would have rented another night that we would not have stayed for. We ended up with a two bedroom suite on the 9th floor, full kitchen and an oceanviewing balcony that slept 7 comfortably for around a hundred dollars. The pool was clean, the room was a little "stale" due to it being a smoking room and the elevators are slow. We knew that the indoor pool and hot tubs were not working, so that was no suprise. The tiki bar and music was nice and going almost the entire time we were there, which was from 1:30 pm on Saturday until we checked out on Sunday night at 6:00 pm. It did rain on Sunday very hard for at least an hour and a half and I believe the music and bar shut down then. It was still pouring down rain when we left, so I don't know if they started up again or not. I would go back. I only saw two bugs the entire time we were there. Staff isn't the friendliest, however, they aren't rude either, just very professional. There were a few leaks in the roof/ceiling that we had to walk around on our way checking out, but not in our room, that we noticed. Walls must have been pretty thick because our neighbors partied until 1 in the morning. I know this because I could hear them very well while I was on the balcony but not while I was inside the room. My husband and I slept on the murphy bed and I slept very good. The doors were a little hard to open and close. If you think the Hampton Inn is a decent place, then this is not the hotel for you. If you think that Motel 6 is a good value, then you should try this place out.

Reviews.Title: “Had a Great time”
Reviews.Author: Joy Ann C
Reviews.Content: We have had a great time every year that we have stayed at this resort. The staff is always willing to help and is very friendly. Room was very clean. We really love Tara who works at the Tiki Bar. She is so friendly and sweet. She makes a effort to get to know you!!!

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed it very much”
Reviews.Author: Joyce C
Reviews.Content: The entire staff was very courteous. The room was very clean and the bed was comfortable. The view from our balconey was spectacular. Tara at the Tiki Bar is awesome, she is very friendly and sweet. This was our 2nd year staying here and we really enjoyed it.

Reviews.Title: “The view made it worth it”
Reviews.Author: Sithlord1973
Reviews.Content: This place is pretty good only because of the view it has other than that I wouldn't recommend it to anybody they charge 5 dollars to park every day after you have paid for a room that crazy and the door to the room looks like somebody took a sledge hammer to the outside of it so like I said the view of the beach is what sells these rooms

Reviews.Title: “Just Say No......”
Reviews.Author: John T
Reviews.Content: The front desk staff was very courteous upon check-in. That was it as far as the notable good at this so called resort. On the web, this hotel was represented as being a very clean and up to date (Resort). I made the mistake of reserving a room with two queen beds, sofa bed with an ocean view. Before I could get to my room, I had to find an elevator that worked in order to get my bags to the 6th floor. Once I was able to find a working elevator, I received a room with two double beds and old dirty sheets. The carpet was old and stained beyond believe. The view was a joke. My supposed ocean view was a parking lot and another resort. I was charged extra for parking and a safe (Safe not provided).The room was dirty and smelled of raid bug spray. It was more than apparent that this place was filthy. The walls, doors were in need of major repair. There was mold in the so called kitchen, bathroom with the ceiling tiles being stained and rusted. I wouldn't let my family stay here if it was a choice between here and my car. I did not even let my bags in the room. I walked back to the front desk and checked out. In my opinion, the only thing this place is good for is demolition.

Reviews.Title: “Dont stay here.”
Reviews.Author: Jenn f
Reviews.Content: Worst hotel we have ever stayed in. It started with the line to check in that took almost an hour. When we got to our room the carpet felt wet and it smelled. There was water all over the bathroom floor. Gross. The air condition on the balcony was falling apart. The sheets had stains on them. Would not recommend staying here.

Reviews.Title: “Trouble with bugs”
Reviews.Author: Karen T
Reviews.Content: Booked LaPlaya at the last minute and was a really good deal on the hotel. Was so excited about the rooftop lounge, oceanviews, etc. We arrive to find chipped paint, dirty sheets, old carpet, and view was with the gazebo blocking part of it. Overall the first few nights were o.k. until we started seeing roaches! Asked the cleaning lady to spray but no sign that it had been done. Outdoor pool was fine but indoor was drained. Rooftop Lounge is only open on weekends and cost money for the show. I just wanted to at least see the view. Overall we still enjoyed our vacation but will not return to LaPlaya. First review ever written on a hotel. It left that kind of a lasting effect. We have stayed in other hotels with bad reviews and dealt with outdated furnishings but not with bugs!!!! Pay a few dollars more for the other 150 or so hotels. Daytona is wonderful!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great Location on the Beach, Bad Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Ady1219
Reviews.Content: La Playa Resort Daytona Beach Visited Daytona Beach for Spring Break, March 2011. The hotel itself has a great location, located near all the main attractions that Daytona Beach has to offer. The best amenity of the hotel is that it is right on the beach. The property has two pools, one outdoor pool, and an inside heated pool, which was great because it was pretty cold. We booked the room with the kitchenette, and was surprise to find out that it was very comfortable and convenient. The down of this hotel comes down to the cleanliness, although the staff is great, it is a very old hotel, and as many of the other reviews I would recommend this hotel for the next Hotel Impossible Show.

Reviews.Title: “Not Good At All.”
Reviews.Author: mitzeljim
Reviews.Content: We have been attending and staying at this place for 12 straight years and this year is our LAST very poor we feel that the place is run down and never being upgraded at the some of the staff is very RUDE exspecially the bartender that was on duty so my advice stay at a mom and pop place instead or find another location.

Reviews.Title: “Worst place I have ever seen!!”
Reviews.Author: Carley F
Reviews.Content: My wife and I was looking for a place to stay a couple nights before we checked into our condo for the next week and I booked this online because the pictures looked good and the price was cheap for being on the beach. We checked in and made it up to our room and the door was wide open, trash in the floor, had a musty mold smell, and was very dirty. I wouldn't let my dog stay here. I walked back to the front desk and checked out 10 min after I checked in and went and stayed at another hotel. The only thing this place is good for is a future building site for another nice condo!!

Reviews.AuthorLocation: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States
Reviews.Title: “special and relaxing”
Reviews.Author: pinchee
Reviews.Content: what a great vacation.it all starts with the minute you walk in the lobby.judith,willie and lynne help you select the perfect room for you.they are awesome and make you feel more than welcome.this is a peaceful resort in every sense of the word.on weekends the resort makes partying fun and friendly with chrissy at the tiki bar.they also have a comedy show on the roof penthouse for a small fee.it's worth it.i wish i could have stayed longer but they were sold out.it was great while it lasted and can't wait to go back.

Reviews.Title: “NEVER AGAIN WILL WE STAY HERE!”
Reviews.Author: Jennifer H
Reviews.Content: room was robbed! hotel did nothing about it! was told maby your door doesn't shut all the way? so looking at it we pulled our door shut and pulled hard! then just gave it a push and yep it opened!so it's our fault for haveing a broken door! have stayed their for past 5 years and will never go back!

Reviews.Title: “Family Reunion”
Reviews.Author: Albert R
Reviews.Content: The Laplaya staf was very courteous and made sure my needs were met, especially the front desk attendant, Jackie. The rooms were aged but for the price I felt that the Laplaya met my needs.

Reviews.Title: “Great location but you get what you pay for.”
Reviews.Author: SMarie_21
Reviews.Content: The room wasn't that bad. If you go, don't expect a flat screen, heavenly beds, or glass shower doors. This would basically be a last resort type of place for the price. The view is amazing from the balcony, the beds are just good enough to sleep in, and the kitchenette plays it role for any cooking you may want to do. The carpet is indeed a bit outdated and either needs to be replaced or deep cleaned. The door locks (thank goodness) although it isn't the most safe looking and the air conditioning works. When you see the building online it looks magnificent in the light but it's really not lol. Paint is chipped and the hallway may or may not smell funny. IN CONCLUSION: great place to stay at a great location for the somewhat decent price. Just know what youre getting yourself into :)

Reviews.Title: “Laplaya will be my home away from home every summer!!!”
Reviews.Author: missthebeach69
Reviews.Content: Hi. My name is Tina. I grew up in Daytona Beach. First I cannot believe all the bad reviews. If you come to Daytona beach just to sit in your room and watch tv, then you should book at the Hilton. The Laplaya is a very old hotel that my dad helped build. It's old, but it's very very clean. I have a medical condition that causes chronic pain and chronic fatigue. Willie at the front desk is accommodating me with a room on the 1st floor that goes directly to the pool and beach. I explained if I had to walk all around and get on an elevator to get to the pool and beach, it would be to much on me. I stayed last year and was very satisfied. Like I said, the tv is old, the decor is old, but there are no bugs and if there is one, remember, this is Daytona. It's hot and muggy and the palmetto bugs love that weather. Just hit it with your flip flop and go on with your day. I won't stay anywhere else. I could afford the Hilton , but I'd rather stay where they respect your privacy and leave you alone to enjoy your vacation. The tiki bar, the staff. Everything about the Laplaya rocks!! See ya in a few Willie!!:-). Tina Larson

Reviews.Title: “Great Staff Bad Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Thefuzz472
Reviews.Content: We booked this hotel through the airline. We we got there to check in they did not have a reservation for us. Clerk said he only had two rooms left so at least we got a room. The room did not meet our expectations, if you walked across the carpet in socks or barefoot your feet would be black. Called airline to change hotels and they said La Playa had already bee pain so they could not change our hotel. Only two elevators worked and they were very slow. The sliding door to the balcony took both of us to open or close it. The room door was hard to open or close. After three nights in this room they finially moved us to a oceanfront room like we had booked in the first place, it was no better, the a/c in this room was barely working very warm in the room during the day. The tiki bar was only open twice during our six night stay. The lounge was only open on fri and sat night and it was a comedy club you had to pay to get in. We had to walk to the hotel next door and visit the tikki bar there which was open all the time. The only good this was the staff here they were all friendly and very willing to help you anytime with a smile.This hotel is very outdated and in need of dire repair and remodeling. Though we did not see any bugs I would not book this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “I Saw It For MySelf: A Great Choice for the Next Episode of "Hotel Impossible"”
Reviews.Author: TravelSmart2012
Reviews.Content: This would have been a great place to stay in the 1970s, but certainly not today. Some view it as a bargain, but my week long experience on the 8th floor in June 2012 featured a door that was extremely hard to close and secure; a variety of bugs, including 1 cockroach; a weak AC unit; extremely dirty, stained, and outdated carpet (1970s style); crumbling concrete balcony railings being held together with wooden planks and plastic pull straps (very dangerous); and a broken elevator. The hotel is too large to only have 3 elevators, and the two that were working were very slow. I frequently had to use the stairs going to and from my room on the 8th floor. I even had to use the stairs to carry my luggage because the unairconditioned elevators were so slow (a 10 minute wait for an elevator was not uncommon). The first floor lobby area is clean and well maintained to create the impression that this is a nice place to stay, but don't be fooled; it is not. This place desperately needs a multi-million dollar renovation. Don't stay here if you are looking for a clean, bug free, room with good AC.

Reviews.Title: “Absolute Bargain”
Reviews.Author: torbasun
Reviews.Content: During the course of our road trip we checked in to this hotel in the very early hours, it was absolutely fine yes the place does need updating, but the room had everything we needed and was clean and tidy and for what we got it was an absolute bargain. The hot tub was out of order but this was not an issue as we spent the whole time on the beach. All in all it was a real steal and did exactly what it said on the packet.

Reviews.Title: “Had a Great Time”
Reviews.Author: valarie c
Reviews.Content: Our church group was concerned about the negative reviews and really didn't know what to expect. To our surprise it was a great place to stay. The staff and other guests were so nice. Cudos to Monica Quarto, the groups sales manager! She made sure that we had what we needed. I would definitely recommend it if you are looking for convenience and want to be economical. It is in a great location and in walking distance to different stores and restaurants. Valarie,WBC

Reviews.Title: “AMAZING! Strongly Recommend!!!”
Reviews.Author: Daniella Y
Reviews.Content: I am staying in this Hotel second time, and I recommeded this hotel to my friends, they all love it and they will come back! The location is perfect. All shops and all kinds of different restaurants are on the other side of the building. Walgreens, McDonalds, souvenir shops, etc. It takes only 3-5 minutes to drive to the Broadwalk and Pier, or 25 minutes to walk there. The rooms are wonderful, because some rooms have kitchen and you can eat inside your room and look to the ocean. The grocery is on the other side, 1 minute away. VERY CONVINIENT! People are very nice and friendly in the Reception, they made my vacation beautiful last time and this time! My friends have the same oppinion and they are going to go back to La Playa Hotel again. I will come back there for sure and I recommend this Hotel to everyone, especially if you have kids! They have two poos - indoor and outside, kids love the pool and they can go and swim at anytime until 11:00PM. Special thanks to Ms. Willie Parker - the front Office Manager! She made our vacation unforgettable because she is always nice to everyone! Thanks Willie! See you soon!

Reviews.Title: “Old and Dirty”
Reviews.Author: ilovemardigras
Reviews.Content: Stayed here 6/16/12. Funny the towels were cleverly shapped like a swan and a basket....how cute til you opened them up and found they were STAINED and felt like sandpaper on your skin, room carpet was disgusting, run down interior, dirty balcony and the balcony door latch was broke so you couldn't even leave to door open to enjoy the view, dirty breezeways leading to room, dirty elevator . Had an ocean front room. I will never stay here again. They need to do some serious renovating!

Reviews.Title: “Awesome!!”
Reviews.Author: shcamck
Reviews.Content: We love this place. It's a great area. The pool deck is very nice with the additional Tiki Bar area complete with Dj Kyle on the weekend. Joe, Chris, Kara, Eil and all the others always fix the best drinks. Love the added food vendor. We ate from the menu several times. Thanks to Williette for helping out with our room & to everyone for all the fun weekends we have spent here. If you are going to the beach to have a good time, this is where it is!!

Reviews.Title: “Summer trip”
Reviews.Author: pooldude13
Reviews.Content: Great view from room, fun patio. AMAZING CHEESEBURGERS and food in the food truck on the beach/ in parking lot! Strongly Recommend!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Dont go”
Reviews.Author: shorty8409
Reviews.Content: Hair on the sheets .run down dump.unvited guests enjoying faclities you pay for.hooligans and shady charaters.broken elavators i could go on and on honsetly shame on me for not checking reviews before i booked but dont make the same mistake i made although music was good except when ur trying to sleep

Reviews.Title: “horrific”
Reviews.Author: Raul L
Reviews.Content: we checked in on an ocean side room with kitchenette, the carpet was coming off, as soon as we opened the door we were hit with the smell of mildew, the towels were dirty and one of them had blood on it, and the walls are paper thin I could hear everything my mother in law said about me, the only good thing about the half hour stay i had there is that the manager was very understanding and refunded me my money back.

Reviews.Title: “Cockroach in the bed”
Reviews.Author: omar531
Reviews.Content: This is a party hotel,You can smell the pot around the bar, The room is threadbare carpet. Dirty and stained blankets on the bed and when I laid my grandson down to nap a big roach came out from under the pillows. I asked for a ground floor pool access room and was booked into the 9th floor so I paid more to get what I booked in the first place. Never again. Check your room before you accept it.

Reviews.Title: “Never!!!”
Reviews.Author: barbergirlOrlando
Reviews.Content: Lobby was nice but has a very bad odor. Happy to check in early but not happy what the room looks like. Found 4 roaches in the room, room was dirty and stinky. Ask frontdesk for another room, frontdesk was rude and just gave us another room without any apology. Second room has roaches too! Dan, the Manager is very nice and very sorry for the inconvenience. Will never stay in la playa the pictures is so nice but wait till you check in.

Reviews.Title: “Dont believe the bad reviews”
Reviews.Author: Rebecca M
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the LaPlaya Resort this past weekend (Memorial Day) and had a great time! Yes the rooms were dated, but me and my family found them clean and totally acceptable. Our room had a full size fridge,stove,microwave and a breath taking view of the ocean. We checked in on Friday, fast and painless and the clerk was very pleasant, sorry I dont remember her name then up to our room on the 6th floor. We got on our swimsuits and headed to the pool deck, found ourselves a table and listened to the DJ and enjoyed a cocktail at the tikibar. We then went to Bokerz Comedy Club for the show, we laughed till we had tears coming down our face. Drinks were not overly priced for a show and as was the entrance fee to the show GREAT NIGHT! Saturday we enjoyed the breakfast buffet, we found the service to be good as well as the meal. Since the weather was turning nasty we went shopping across the street to Bealls and the outlet, found some great buys! As we went back to the hotel after dinner we watched the waves roll in as well as the clouds and people running in from the storm. What I found crazy was the people coming up from the beach with sand all over there bodies and jumping into the pool to get the sand off. Would they do that in their pools at home? Overall we will definatly go back to the LaPlaya....great service from the front desk to the housekeepers that took great care of us! Im just sorry we could only stay 2 days. THANKS LaPlaya!

Reviews.Title: “Horrible room, hotel in disrepair”
Reviews.Author: mackeinmexico
Reviews.Content: We were booked into a side room with ocean view. The carpet was dirty and had several large stains all throughout the room. Bedspreads had stains on the undersides of them. Mattresses were old and frayed. We thought the room was in bad shape, but then when we walked along the outside open hallway, we noticed cable ties on the banisters. The cable ties were holding the concrete together so that chunks didn't fall off. The parking garage had several areas roped off for No Parking due to structural issues that were evident in the underground garage. Large jacks were erected to support cracks in the beams. The pool had a coating of suntan oil scum covering the tile around the inside edge of the pool. Indicated to me that they don't clean the pool.

Reviews.Title: “Terrible”
Reviews.Author: Jmefuller1986
Reviews.Content: Advertises an indoor pool...went to search for it because it was raining out and it was closed down. Room floors were wet and stained our feet black. Very dirty. Photos on all travel websites show beautiful pictures of the place. Looks nothing like the pictures. Outdoor pool was full of sand. Would only recommend for a cheap spring break stay.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: Linda L
Reviews.Content: Although I am still on vacation and at the LaPlaya as I write, I felt compelled to dispell the horrible reviews. I am in my room which has glass fronting the ocean with a good sized balcony. There is a generous kitchenette. Yes people it is a little old however a few things to keep in mind. (1) This is an oceanfront resort! You are not at a five star hotel in France. The bedroom is large and the living area big enough for a family of four. When I travel for work I stay in five star hotels and I enjoy them very much. But when I am on vacation at the shore I stay at a typical oceanfront resort which is what LaPlaya is. There are bugs if you leave your door open you will get bugs in your room. This is Florida. Roaches are plentiful and although I did not see any I am sure that they are around. I kept my garbage in the freezer and made sure I cleaned up any food or drinks, this is Florida! The ocean is literally steps away and it is beautiful. The pool is right on the ocean and the chairs are plentiful and the water is clean. The staff is outstanding and ready to help. They go above and beyond. Yes they charge $5.00 a day to park your car but they can do that because of their low rates. The hotel is directly across from the Belair Shopping Plaza with a Bells, Walgreens, Publix, doggie supermarket, dots, payless, bowling area and Ruby Tuesdays. This vacation was perfect and please please please do not listen to any of the negative reviews. If you are looking for the Ritz Carlton I believe it is not in Daytona Beach but Amelia Island, go there instead.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay!!”
Reviews.Author: FLgirl201183
Reviews.Content: My family and I just got back from staying at this resort today. I was extremely nervous after reading the reviews for this resort but decided to take it with a grain of salt... And I'm glad I did. Check in took a while and made me a little nervous as well. People continuously skipped in line which made it take so long but a couple of young girls were raising hell when we got there about security stealing there car keys however I believe they were drunk and lost the keys. Once we checked in it was fine. The rooms are out dated but you get what u pay for. If u want a five star resort then I would suggest u pay the extra money and book with a five star resort. The rooms were clean and the ocean front rooms had a beautiful view. We had a full size fridge a small stove and microwave. The beds were a little small I believe they were full size but it worked. The pool was great! They have a smaller pool for children and the best part is the tiki bar that has a DJ that plays music by the pool and you can order drinks and food poolside. There's also a publixs right across the street which is nice we walked over and bought a few groceries... We had a great time and would go back again. Daytona Beach is a party beach however, as long as your careful it's fine. I have a six year old daughter and she had a great time. I would suggest travelling in groups if you go out at night especially during certain times in Daytona. The hotel was great and I can't wait to go back.

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed stay around Spring break”
Reviews.Author: nathanbradin
Reviews.Content: Was actually attending a wedding but realized it was spring break for many as well. Hotel was nice, very nice location close to beach. We had a car so dont know how much shopping is really near by. Surely there is a bus available and its on a main road. There was alot of noise because of young spring breakers but we are also young and didnt mind. We had very nice balcony overlooking the pool and the ocean. Would consider staying there again if every in Daytona.

Reviews.Title: “NASTY”
Reviews.Author: janice P
Reviews.Content: We booked 3 rooms with Oceanview when we arrived for check in we waited for over 30 minutes to check in and the front desk clerk was rude... Our rooms were facing the parking lot with no Ocean view they over booked at this hotel and never gave us a reduction of price due to their error. One of the rooms the A/c did not even work for several hours and all 3 rooms were dirty...... They smell ed okay but was not clean. The carpets look as if they haven't been cleaned in years the bed are awful it felt like i was sleeping on rocks. I can deal with an out dated room but a dirty room HELL NO..... I will never stay at this hotel again even if it was for free....... Poor management and nasty room...

Reviews.Title: “The place should be torn down!!”
Reviews.Author: Zh B
Reviews.Content: In years past, we've stayed here many times, when Best Western owned it. We will never stay here again. The price is very high for a 5th rate hotel. They should pay people to stay here, if people like to live in filth, that is! I won't even go into the size of the bugs in the suite. The rugs on the floors haven't been cleaned in months, maybe years! Yes, it's that filthy. If you walk around in your socks, just throw them away. You cannot wash the black off them. The seats were really bad. Mold on some of the wood. We had to place towels on the chairs and the couch, to keep from getting the filth on our clothes. Needless to say, we will never stay at this hotel again. We just have good memories of staying here when Best Western owned it. The noise on Friday and Saturday nights, will keep you from sleeping, unless you wear earplugs, or are deaf! We were on the 4th floor and the Tiki noise was too loud in the room, that we couldn't carry on a conversation!! If you don't mind living in filth and don't mind loud noise, then this is the place for you! You've been warned, so if you come down with some illness, you have only yourself to blame. Take my advice, go elsewhere!!

Reviews.Title: “Lows..hotel condition, cleanliness..Highs..Tiki Bar, Food Truck, Weather.”
Reviews.Author: DanC1991
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 3 days 2(nights) for a quick getaway for the weekend. In short, the building and it's offerings are a bit on the older side. It could of been a bit cleaner, but the staff tried their hardest to make it enjoyable. We enjoyed the Tiki Bar a lot and the drinks were poured right. The pool gets covered in shade by 1pm so we spent most of the time on the beach. The hotel doesn't serve lunch, but another guest told us about a Food Truck that was in front of the property..what a great offering this was! We ended up eating there twice a day during our stay. More than common Hot Dogs and Hamburgers... Coconut Shrimp, Fish Sandwiches Real BBQ..just awesome food. Good drinks, great food and wonderful weather makes anyplace good.

Reviews.Title: “Not the best”
Reviews.Author: Christi P
Reviews.Content: Made reservations online in advance. When we got there rooms werent ready. Had a pay to park one vehicle. Roaches in kitchenette area. Shower wouldnt drain. Balconies are side by side with every room. Any body could jump from balcony to balcony and break in. Not safe in my opinion. But they would gladly let us pay for a safe??!! WTH? Pools were gross! Hot tub had bubbles in it. So we didnt even get to swim the entire time we were there. The entire stay was nasty. WILL NOT RETURN AND DO NOT RECOMMEND. La Playa needs to invest in cleaning and remodeling. Ceilings were peeling over our beds. Hallways were just plain dirty. I hated to think that the housekeepers clean in the same manor.

Reviews.Title: “it was ok...”
Reviews.Author: stylekapone
Reviews.Content: really didnt like this hotel... too many people in your way while your trying to get to your room, long waiting for elevator... The hotel seems more like a ghost town... the pool area with the tiki bar is the only good thing about this hotel......

Reviews.Title: “Nice pool/tiki bar....easy access to beach and food truck with awesome food!”
Reviews.Author: KAH2012
Reviews.Content: Needs updating but would stay again convenient to shopping but don't have to leave the hotel if just relaxing

Reviews.Title: “Noisy, dirty, and falling apart! Sleezy and Overpriced!”
Reviews.Author: brookesmommy1101
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the LaPlaya for 3 nights last week. At first glance, the hotel looks "ok" but as we got into our room we realized that the stove in the room was very outdated and broken, the bathroom ceiling was rusty, and when you take a shower the entire floor floods. On our 2nd day there no one had come to clean the room and I had asked for a cot that was never delivered, so I called and they brought the cot but never cleaned the room. THEN, we walk into the elevator to go down to the beach and there is blood all over the floor with footprints in it. Yes... BLOOD! Then our last night we were there it was VERY noisy with the d.j down by the pool and drunk idiots screaming in the parking garage (the doors are not very thick) we got little sleep. To top it off, my brother forgot his room key and I called down to the front desk to let them know. They told me it wouldn't be a problem. I was woken up to my brother calling the room phone 3 times at 1:30 AM telling me they wouldn't let him up. The man in the lobby threatened to have him thrown out if he left the lobby to go knock on the door and was extreamely rude. When I called the manager to complain about my stay they gave me a whopping $40 refund.... The hotel next door is so much nicer and is the same price. I will be staying there next time for sure.

Reviews.Title: “EEEEEWWWW GROSS”
Reviews.Author: FLmom_12
Reviews.Content: We are staying at La Playa in Daytona and it is disgusting. The carpet in the room is filthy actually SLIMY, the proof is in the blackened bottom of my family's feet! The appliances in the room are rusty & not clean. For some reason, one of the pillows in our room was wet. Eeew! Don't even want to think about why that pillow was wet. The a/c in the room above us is leaking into our room. A maintainence man came & shop vac-ed the water, but says he can't find any issues upstairs so they just put some towels down (they were out of our room's towel count apparently, so my family had to share the 3 towels & 0 hand towels that were left for us)!! I almost forgot, the hot tub is broken and apparently no one cleans the beach stairs access because the same rotten diaper has been reaking up the stairway for the past 2 days.

Reviews.Title: “racefan”
Reviews.Author: racefans_12
Reviews.Content: my wife and i stayed stayed at laplaya for 6 nights for the dayatona 500. we were pleasanty surprised about the clean rooms,and the service of there staff. We booked our room through priceline and was to check out on thursday morning, but decided to stay another night and the front desk was very helpful, and we did not have to switch rooms. Aslo, we spent a few afternoons at the pool bar with a very personable bartender named chrissie. We have been going to the 500 for 6 years now and stayed at alot different hotels done of witch measure up to the laplaya. I look forward going back to laplaya in 2013 and spending some time with are new freind chrissie.

Reviews.Title: “Great location and service, needs some maintenance.”
Reviews.Author: MNLowroller
Reviews.Content: We stayed 6 nights at LaPlaya during Bike week, I’ll try to be as comprehensive and objective as I can. We got in to town early, I called and one of my 2 rooms was ready for early check in. The hotel was very easy to find and had good access from either North or Southbound A1A. Across the street is a grocery store anchored strip mall. The check in process was quick and painless with no unexpected surprises, they took my number and called me when my second room was ready which was still before standard check in time. There is a parking fee of $5 per vehicle per day, we had 2 trucks and 4 motorcycles, they only charged for the trucks. There is a 2 story parking ramp, and even during this busy week we had no trouble finding a place to park. Facility: There was a single elevator near the lobby and 2 more at the back of the hotel on the way to the pool area, they all functioned as expected. In the mirrored hallway between the lobby and the rear elevators is a breakfast restaurant which we patronized several days, it was cheap and tasty and had good service. Out the back of the hotel you’ll pass a couple vending machines on your left, then out to the pool deck. Pool deck had a Tiki Bar with too loud dj music all day, good drinks, good service, and what seemed to be randomly selected prices, a blended margarita was between $5 and $8 depending on the day of he week, bartender, and phase of the moon. Also on the pool deck is an ankle deep kiddie pool, and regular rectangular pool, entry through a broken gate to the beach beyond, and a shower area to hose off after visiting aforementioned beach. If you look real hard you can also find an indoor pool and hot tub, I verified the hot tub worked, but never used it. On the 10th floor (rear elevators only) there is also some type of penthouse bar, it was never open when I wanted it, my friends did use it, I believe they said they had some booze there. Room: We entered room 824 from an outside corridor that faces the 2 story parking ramp. Enter through the door which had a deadbolt and a chain lock. To the right was a door with a long mirror on it, I assume it went to an adjoining room. To the left was a bathroom alcove, Toilet and shower behind a closed door from the sink and closet. There was a hairdryer, iron, ironing board, and a safe, we only used the hairdryer and I assume it worked fine since my wife never complained about it. Past the bathroom alcove to the main body of the room. Clockwise from my immediate left- Kitchenette with Microwave, counter height ice cold fridge, full size coffee pot (Hint: we bought coffee, filters, and coffee fixins across the street), ice bucket and plastic cups, single medium to small sink, a few drawers, and a few upper cabinets. In the cabinets we found service for 4, real plates, coffee cups, and silverware, I don’t recall if they had bowls. Continuing around the room, a table with 2 cushioned chairs, an armoire with three drawers and a standard definition 20ish inch tv, the far wall was all glass, covered in light blocking curtains and had the AC/Heat unit, the sliding door on this wall had seen better days and often went off track during operation. Out on the balcony, look left for a1a facing North, straight ahead to another hotel’s pool area, look right for a just slightly obstructed view of the ocean. There are two plastic chairs and a plastic table out here as well. Back in the room a single drawer night stand separated the two full size beds, they were comfortable enough with standard bedding and several pillows. The room also had free wifi with an accept the terms push page. It worked with my Ipad, but my phone couldn't get connected. Overall opinion: Overall the hotel served its purpose, but it really does need some maintenance in almost every area. The beachfront location is excellent, the service and all the staff were good to great, it really is too bad that the building is in such rough shape. It was totally worth the severely discounted rate that I paid, but I would be upset with the quality if I had paid full price.

Reviews.Title: “Would NEVER stay here again! Don't let the website & pictures decieve you-Its NOT like that at all!”
Reviews.Author: COnnie_36_12
Reviews.Content: I have stayed here before an tried to warn my brother about doing a group booking here. He had a family group stay here for my niece's 5th birthday party and prebooked 7 rooms. We were told all the rooms would be on the 6th floor, all be side by sie and some of them connecting. He got a ecent rate considering it was a group, but not worth the MANY issues we encountered! The rooms weren't too much of a discount because it was already slow season-we stayed in February. My brother mae arrangements to have her birthday at the indoor pool (of course, because it was too cold for pool or beach water). I told my brother last time I stayed here (Oct 2011) nothing worked (hot tubs, indoor pool, etc). So, the day before arrival he called and asked if all was working and he was told YES. And of course we all arrive an none were working BUT the inoor hot tub an at that it closed at 9pm! Rooms fille with mold everywhere, nasty room-had to wait till next morning to get our room RECLEANED, teeny tiny balconies, if thts what they want to call them, front of ac half off (not good when we have a 3yr old todler with us), we were all spread out on the 6th floor with different types of rooms, none of them adjoining nor connecting :/ We tried working with the manager, the male manager-forgot his name because everyone you talk to there is a manager! He was rude, inconsiderate, and plain out nasty attitude that he had my sister-in-law in tears. There's just too much to say badly about this place! Service-Cleaness-Customer Service, etc all was ROTTEN! Pretty much ruined my niece's beach birthday because they wouldn't give money back to go somewhere else that had an indoor pool that was actually warm and heated as it is advertised! DO NOT BELIEVE WHAT YOU SEE ON THEIR WEBSITE, OR THE PICS-ITS NOTHING LIKE IT AND VERY DECIEVING! This place is goo for people that don't care about cleaness and customer service, spring breakers that just want to get runk an party and not care about where they stay. Good location but absolutely NOT kid-friendly place an sooooo NOT worth the money. You been warned! Good luck!

Reviews.Title: “Bikeweek”
Reviews.Author: bikenights
Reviews.Content: We stay here every year for bike week and biketoberfest..And we know that the hotel needs some work done and udated..But over all,,to be really honest..If you wanted a 5 star hotel, then why didn't you stay in one. But i do rate this hotel as a 4 .. You can't beat the price.. We have never ever had any trouble in the last 5 yrs of coming here. The staff is so nice. The security and having it is great. The room is always clean, the service is great. The view is so nice....I feel safe stayin here for sure. Its only 5 minutes from main street. And across the street you have alot of stuff over there if you need any supplies. So hope to see you there Will be back Mar 16, 2012 to stay again....and again in Oct

Reviews.Title: “cheap”
Reviews.Author: ITA_And_RE_a
Reviews.Content: It is an older hotel. Room service (cleaning room) is good, but it still an old hotel. Location is on the beach and a good walk from the center of Daytona beach central activities and shops. There is a shopping center (incl Walgreens) across the street.

Reviews.Title: “Hah Horrid, but nice bar”
Reviews.Author: Jen219
Reviews.Content: We were vacationing and decided to take an over night trip to Daytona. . .Found this Hotel on PRICELINE for 179.00$. . . TOO MUCH! We had a neat balcony; but the door was broken and didn't lock. The air conditioner cover was falling off and dangerous! The waves crashing in on the beach was neat. Location was good! could walk EVERYWHERE! The hottub was broken, which was HORRIBLE. The bartender was nice. When we told the front desk about our dissatisfaction, they gave us a whole NINE DOLLARS OFF! WHOO HOO! oh joy! Do NOT stay here. . . There are plenty of nicer hotels on daytona beach. The beach is dirty anyways. . .Stay in Key West!

Reviews.Title: “24 Hr Rolex races”
Reviews.Author: kamkam18
Reviews.Content: The hotel was average, out dated a little, our room was clean, but dated and the kitchen area was kinda funky, with spray painted stove and ref. sloppy paint job. lol - inside pool kids enjoyed, hot tub was small and ruff seating felt like sitting in bumpy rocks. But overall it was just ok...

Reviews.Title: “Disaster in Daytona”
Reviews.Author: Malenevh
Reviews.Content: Without a doubt the worst hotel experience we have EVER had. We a travelled overall the world and have stayed in some ropey b&b's in the dark streets of Blackpool, but even those have nothing on this once. Bad service at the front desk, drunks falling out of the lobby, shady professions appearing to be going on in the lift, run down, filthyrooms, cigarette smell and a bar 10 feet from our room. We turned around and left immediately. I would suggest you do the same.

Reviews.Title: “golf vacation”
Reviews.Author: mark p
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice motel with kitchenets and double full size beds that is perfect for golf vacations. The motel sits right on the beach. The only problem is if you are a light sleeper request at least a third floor room or higher. The rooms are very clean and the wi fi works great.

Reviews.Title: “my vacation home”
Reviews.Author: angelMyrtlebeachSc
Reviews.Content: We visit laplya every year for 42 days or more and we love it.we have a small pet and we stay in the same room every year.laplya is a older property that does need some work,like beds and carpet,dan the general manager is trying hard to fix the place up-he put a new motor in the jacuzzi while we were their he had work done on hot water heater-we really appreciate all you done to make our vacation special.willie and ally are great at the desk-they make us feel right at home.the view from the balcony is breath taking and laplya is close to everything.the restaurant is wonderful and so is the staff.housekeeping was wonderful during our stay,we clean our own room but they made sure we had everything we needed during our stay.we are already looking forward to our stay again in november-thanks again to the entire staff of laplya for making our vacation great-dan thanks for all you done and all you will be doing-see you in november.teresa and joe of myrtlebeach sc

Reviews.Title: “Great stay, Awesome staff!!”
Reviews.Author: astarr6190
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed at the Laplaya at the begining of December and we enjoyed every second of it!! Yes it is true that the place needs a few rennovations, but we were not expecting the Hilton. The lobby was nice and clean and the lady at the front desk (Kristen) was very helpful and offered exceptional guest service. We went to the comedy show that Friday night and had Chrissie as a waitress. She was absolutely fantastic!! The room had your normal wear and tear, and we also understood that being right on the ocean takes a toll on things. We were pleased with our stay and will be returning for sure!!

Reviews.Title: “DISGUSTING HOTEL !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Frequenttravelerof40
Reviews.Content: Do not and I mean do not stay in this hotel, stay anywhere but here !!! I cannot believe that some reviewers actually said this was a nice hotel, I AM SHOCKED!! Where have they stayed and I could only imagine...well nevermind.. On our stay we left right after our Thanksgiving turkey dinner to head to Daytona for their annual Turkey Run which is a classic car show & we stayed at this hotel. I was hesitant after learning that this was the hotel we were booked in because I knew about this hotel from way back when I was 17 and stayed here on spring break (I'm 41 now). I remembered what we did to the room and that it was a complete party hotel and I mean that to its fullest extent and thought boy I hope they've made improvements along the way. I went online to look at the hotel and also read the reviews on this site. Some were great and others were horrible but after calling the hotel I was told they have completely renovated the hotel and we had the best room in the house. We were on the 7th floor in a suite equipt with a kitchen, murphy bed, and seperate bedroom. The second we walked in the hallway and onto the elevator I knew nothing had changed. The floors were cracked and you could tell the original paint was there but hiden by grime. The elvator floor made me check the last inspection date the second I entered. When we got to our floor at midnight I saw the old Jolousy windows and the musty heavy drapes and knew I was in trouble. The floor was completely covered in stains that you could tell they repeatedly tried to remove but its was past cleaning by about 20 years, the toilet paper roll was rusted and almost falling off, the lock on the door had so many screws it in most of which werent doing anything for the lock they were just too lazy to take them out as new locks were installed. The dishes in the kitchen were filthy... I could go on and on.. Its was the most disgusting hotel I have ever every stayed in. Since everything was booked for turkey run we had no choice but to stay. Thank god we brought pillows and blankets for our kids on the car ride up as I would have never put my head or body on that bed. I wore socks constantly and flip flops and checked for bed bugs. I laid the comfortor which was gross over the floor so at least I could think it was somewhat cleaner.. The balcony had rebar sticking out and just seemed unsafe to even be on. Yes the staff was nice but that doesnt make for a clean safe hotel...are you kidding. Dont make the mistake I did in assuming the complaints were old or believing they have remodeled they havent and I am suprised we dont have scabies or head lice...it was beyond disgusting.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, Friendly Staff, Dump of a Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Tracie H
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and I stayed here for Turkey Rod Run 2011. The location is PERFECT!! As far as the hotel it's self...NEEDS A MAJOR OVERHAUL!!! The hotel needs a good scrubbing on the outside and could use better lighting in the hallways. The elevators were slow. We ended up taking the stairwell a majority of the time, which we found the levels were not marked so it made it difficult to know which level you were on. The rooms were dated and need a MAJOR makeover. The carpet in our room had holes and was coming up around the door ways. The doors were hard to open from the outside. Luckily for me my boyfriend is a big strong guy or we would not been able to access our beach balcony due to the fact we could not open the balcony door. We stayed 2 nights and not once received a free "complimentary" newspaper. The breakfast bar they were charging $10.95 for was nothing more than what you get at a "free continetal breakfast". The staff was very friendly but the hotel its self is a dump. Would we stay here again...PROBABLY NOT!!! The price you pay for a room you would think it would be of better quality.

Reviews.Title: “Turkey rod run”
Reviews.Author: vsandow
Reviews.Content: Chrissy, kara and kristen made me feel so at home. I cannot imagine staying any where else......

Reviews.Title: “Still unsatisfied customers!”
Reviews.Author: my3sons4
Reviews.Content: Since I went to the LaPlaya in July 2011, I have constantly kept up with reading the reviews about this place. It is so sad when I read them and people are saying the same things that I complained about. The hotel or the management did not even try to accommodate my sons and I. Well, they did try to offer another smelly poorly cleaned room. I was offended even more because they in no way tried to help and we didn't even stay one night, mind you, we had paid for two nights. I was not offered to go to another one of their properties and definitely not given a refund. What really bothers me the most is that this was a gift from a friend for my childrens birthday. They wanted to stay on the beach, so she went online to book the reservations. She called me and we both looked at the website to this HELL HOLE and we fully understand what the meaning of " looks can be deceiving!

Reviews.Title: “A Wonderful Week Vacation For Me, My Ill Husband Whom Is A Hospice Patient @ Home & His Brother”
Reviews.Author: dnolan45
Reviews.Content: This Is A Wonderful Hotel..The Staff Were All Wonderful...The Hotel Is Maintained In A Very Good Way..I Had No Complaint's At All..We Even Extended Our Stay For A Extra 2 Day's For A Car Show & Had A Wonderful time. Thank You To The Staf Of This Hotel For Helping Us Enjoy Our Stay To The Best Extreme As Possible..I Highly Reccommend People To Choose This Hotel When Visiting The Area.

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice Place”
Reviews.Author: jdbiker
Reviews.Content: Again for the 4th year we had a wonderful stay. Nice pool and easy access to the beach. My wife loved the Tikki Bar. Staff very friendly. Good value. Will be back in 2012 for Biketoberfest and stay here for the week.

Reviews.Title: “Don't believe the reviews..Great fun at Biketoberfest wknd”
Reviews.Author: BocaGuru
Reviews.Content: I just got back from Biketoberfest Daytona 2011 and stayed three nights at La Playa. I love the hotel, the staff were friendly and young, greeting us when we arrived. Big banners were strung outside "Welcome Bikers".. plenty of covered bike parking, no cars in the way... My room had a gorgeous ocean view balcony, right over the pool. The pool and Tiki bar were open and the party went on all weekend, Chrissie at the Tiki bar made strong drinks and chatted w everyone. My room was clean, if old, bed was soft, slept real good, room was large by today's hotel standards w kitchenette, but did I mention the view!! Wow the ocean was so close and the view 180 degrees of sea. I could hear the waves on the beach at night, as is always true with resorts, location, location, location, there is a Starbucks across the street and Dennys and many other restaurants within walking distance. All in All I really enjoyed my stay at La Playa.

Reviews.Title: “We were pleasantly surprised.”
Reviews.Author: cooney99
Reviews.Content: My wife won our stay at this hotel, we had our choice of 8 cities, we picked Daytona Beach, Columbus Day Weekend 2011. I had read the bad reviews and was thinking 'Oh Boy', I think we screwed up, we had better get there early, so we can switch rooms in case our room is horrible. We got to the hotel about 4 pm, thought the lobby , front desk area looked fine. The front desk person Kristen was very friendly, helpful, and personable. Our room was on the 5th floor, we had a view on the ocean from the balcony, and out the front door was a shopping center with Publix and a Starbucks. Our first day it was very windy & raining, we ended up going to Ocean Walk and saw the movie 'Real Steel'. One of the best movie I have ever seen, was great in every way. Today the weather was sunny, fluffy white clouds, the birds were even singing. In our room I saw no roaches, we had plenty hot water, the ac did not leak, worked fine, did not look old. The was no odor in the room. Sure in a few places the carpet showed some wear. One spot on the ceiling, and a small spot on the bathroom wall needed some TLC. But overall I was pleasantly surprised, we have seen much worse. We were very happy staying here. My wife had worked for Royal Caribbean Cruise Line for 16 years, and has been in the travel industry for many years. This has been a great 3 day vacation. Hope this will help someone..

Reviews.Title: “Never Again!”
Reviews.Author: MCarver79
Reviews.Content: We have stayed here before. In April for my birthday. We got a King Suite and had a lovely time. Not this time. My fiance's birthday was October 8th. I suprised him with a night away to the beach. I called a week ahead and reserved room 901 (which is the same room we had in April), the lady told me it was all reserved and we were good to go. Upon arriving, the front desk clerk, told me they had already rented room 901 for the night. So they gave us the floor below, same room, same setup. We walk into the room and set or things down. Walk over to the window to look out and at the same time have water hit us on the back. We look up and there is a HUGE water spot with water dripping, the carpet it soaked. I called the front desk and it rang for over 5 mins with no one ever picking up. We go down to the lobby and they give us another room, 118, walk into this room and the "Oceanfront" view is blocked by the pool deck and garbage cans. We go back to the lobby to be informed they are all out of King suites and offer us the last remaining "suite" 818. Upon entering this room, you can smell mildew instantly, and the room was damp. The towels, bedding, sheets, beds, couches, chairs, etc were all damp. My fiance was tired of the song and dance from the front so we decided to stay and it was awful. The phone in our room didn't work. The carpeting had some kind of a film on it and we had to keep shoes on at all times. The weather wasn't nice either, but that wasn't the hotels fault. The service was horrible, the rooms were worse. We weren't offered a price break considering the king suite is more than the double bed suite we got. So much for a suprise for my finance's birthday. This ruined us on coming back to Daytona for a while.

Reviews.Title: “absolute "Pigpen"”
Reviews.Author: NotfussyCanucks
Reviews.Content: We would rather sleep on a clothesline with a knot for a pillow than stay at this hotel. Very very dirty. Filthy floors,rusty kitchenette appliances, cheap and dirty plastic chairs on balcony, peeling paint,dirty and leaking air conditoner,very unhealthy to say the least,dame sheets and carpets,left over food on floor. Would not recommend this place to my worst enemy. Checked out as soon as we checked in and not a minute too soon. Do NOt GO There.!!!

Reviews.Title: “Looks can be Deceiving,,more of a 1/2 star hotel.”
Reviews.Author: newf-couple c
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel about 4/5 years agao and it was a nice clean friendly place,we returned there this year in Sept,,,,,NEVERR NEVER AGAIN...roaches bugs,,smelly run down,,mice by the pool in evenings,,,,AVOID THIS PLACE,, Also charged for parking ,,when the place was 3/4 empty.....NEVERRRRRR AGAIN

Reviews.Title: “Pleasantly Pleased !!!”
Reviews.Author: Liam P
Reviews.Content: I stayed at The La Playa for the first time with my family who had come to town for a Family Reunion. Being from here I was all ready aware of the conditions of the hotels due to the salt air and beating they take from the ocean. BUT, as I said I was Pleasantly Pleased! The friendliness at the Front Desk was a perfect start to a GREAT WEEKEND! The rooms were a little old fashioned but were neat and clean,on vacation the time spent in there is basically to chill and sleep. The pool deck was clean with a lot of lounge chairs for everyone and an awesome Tiki Bar and DJ who played good music. The staff in the hotel and I mean from the Front Desk, Housekeeping, Waitresses and Bartenders even Maintenance was more then accommodating, actually was almost like they went out of their way to make sure we had a good time. They even have a Comedy Club on the weekends where I haven't laughed that hard in a long time. From my oceanfront room the full moon was breath taking. Myself and my family enjoyed our stay so much we already booked a vacation for next year. THANK YOU LA PLAYA - you and your staff made it a wonderful Family Reunion!

Reviews.Title: “NOT WORTH THE MONEY”
Reviews.Author: krismyers6
Reviews.Content: I recentlly made a reservation here and what a mistake. The RESORT IS NOTHING LIKE THE PICTURES. We booked this for a night(9/17/2011) and what a nightmare. One you got past the lobby its dirty the paint is chipping the door to the room looked as though it had been broken into the room smelled moldie the carpet was dirty and the a/c smelled. The manager was rude and not willing to help when we asked for a refund a few min. after checking in. I wrote a letter to the general manager and to bookdaytona.com lets see what they do. Dont waste your money,

Reviews.Title: “Not worth the money”
Reviews.Author: 210Nana210
Reviews.Content: We had 3 rooms and were making a stop for a couple of days at the beach after our cruise. We had bugs of all kinds, not enough towels for 5 to a room. No cot for the fifth person after told they would bring us one. When we asked for towels we were told wwe had to bring the dirty ones to the office to get clean ones. The frige in one room did not work and the fire dectector in another beeped all the time. Parking was hard to find even though we had to pay to park. Location was great and the outdoor pool was very enjoyable with the exception of the security guard telling our littles one that they needed to quit jumping in the pool because they would get too tired(parents were in the pool with them. Next night she told our group that they had to get out of pool because it was lightening...but we saw no lightening so continued to enjoy the pool which was the best feature of the hotel plut its location to the beach.

Reviews.Title: “Won't make that mistake again”
Reviews.Author: 611Chuck67
Reviews.Content: Guess I got what I paid for. Room had a funny smell to it, floors in room and bathroom were filthy, door to porch was off track and would not stay in track, door to room had been kicked or forced open so many times it had sheet metal with dry wall screws in it, had to lift and push door shut, door had to be lifted and yanked open. LOUD when I was there, place was full of kids from a church re-treat. I would not stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “DON'T DO IT, REALLY, DON'T DO IT”
Reviews.Author: Floridalocal2
Reviews.Content: We were very disappointed with our room, it was dirty and the balcony door did not lock. The toilet did not flush, We asked for a new room and was given a key for a room that was already occupied (don't think he was happy that we tried to get in), then moved to a room where the AC did not work, The 4th room we were moved to was still dirty, but everything seemed to work. The girl at the desk was rude and said they have know way of knowing there are problems with the room, I would think that the hotel management would have every room clean and in working order, but not the case here. This place is in great location and with some renovations (like tile and not filthy green carpets), an decent staff this could be a good place, but right now it sucks. This is my first night her and I can not sleep because it is so uncomfortable it's 2:00am!

Reviews.Title: “Had a wonderful time!!!”
Reviews.Author: TravelingFloridianPc
Reviews.Content: Just wanted to take a moment to thank the staff at LaPlaya for a wonderful time this past Monday and Tuesday! My friend was visiting from PA so I took her over to the beach for a couple days! The hotel was wonderful and we loved the staff! We found a great corner on the pool deck and parked ourselves there for the day! I must say, our favorite part of the whole couple of days was Kara at the pool bar! She's fantastic and her drinks are amazing! Thanks so much for a wonderful time!!!

Reviews.Title: “Nice but needs updating”
Reviews.Author: cootnbear
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the LaPlaya Resort for our anniversary. If you just want a place to lay your head down at night this is the place for you. Our room was beach front so that was a plus. We didn't have any problems during our stay we just probably won't be back until they update it. The bathrooms, carpets, elevators and doors need updating badly. Stay away from the restaurant on site. It has very bad food they cover up by using so much salt on. We only ate breakfast there one day and believe me it was enough. There is a Denny's down the road so I would go there if I were you. The comedy club was a definite plus to having a room there. We had a blast there. The Tiki Bar was very good and the people at the whole hotel were very very nice.

Reviews.Title: “My New Favorite on the beach (Local resident)”
Reviews.Author: IKARE
Reviews.Content: I live local and often will spend a few days beachside...this was my first time at LaPlaya but will not be the last. After years at another resort further south in Daytona Beach we gave it a try and I am so glad we did. The rooms were very clean. The staff was absolutely the BEST I have encountered at ANY resort all over the world. John at the front desk was PHENOMINAL! THe pool area has plenty of chairs and quite a few tables with umbrellas. THe Tiki Bar was reasonably priced and the staff was great. Just a few steps away... the beach and it is part of the "drive on" beach BUT the traffic in this particular area is not as heavy as it is further south on the beach. THis is not a 5 star resort....but if you are looking for a clean place, reasonably priced with attentive staff then this is a perfect choice.

Reviews.Title: “A great view and escape for our family! Perfect on a budget :)”
Reviews.Author: socialmama80
Reviews.Content: When we got to check in it was very busy. There is a beautiful lobby and plenty of seating for the kids. They were able to plug in their gaming systems and relax while I waited to check in. The staff were accommodating and answered all my questions, as I had lots being a single mom on vacation with my 2 youngsters. We were thrilled to walk into our suite and see the heart shaped swan towels on our beds. The view is breath-taking, right on the beach! The rooms are not brand new, however our suite was clean and tidy. My expectation when I vacation is to spend plenty of time sight seeing, not indoors. I enjoyed relaxing on the balcony. We were on a strict budget for this trip, so it worked out perfectly to have Publix right across the street. We did our groceries and were able to prepare and cook all our meals in the suite. The rest of our time was spent in the indoor and outdoor pool, and on the beach. We traveled to the Mall and checked out the speedway. Daytona has a beautiful library with a large play room that the kids enjoyed. I would certainly go again!

Reviews.Title: “We absoluteley had the time of our lives”
Reviews.Author: jacksonb1671
Reviews.Content: LaPlaya is a wonderful , exciting , clean, and so friendly hotel to experience!! Maid service and all ammenties are grade A+. I have stayed at LaPlaya since it was built and now with all new up-grades don't worry I will stay again and again!! Was there 2 and half weeks and going back in October for another Week. Enjoy and stay for a most relaxing stay!! JBrown Bristol TN

Reviews.Title: “Best Hotel Staff Ever!”
Reviews.Author: coryb13
Reviews.Content: Willie and Jackie at the front desk were the most helpful, outgoing, and fun hotel staff members we've ever experienced. They helped us a lot and they were fun, while being professional. I hope every hotel staff member that i will ever encounter will be as great as them. A+ on this hotel/staff.

Reviews.Title: “Great "bang-for-the-buck!"”
Reviews.Author: mdglawe
Reviews.Content: Stayed here with my family July 18-23 and loved it. It's no Sandals, but for the money, it's great! The desk staff was awesome, and the restaurant staff was excellent. If you are looking for a beach vacation on a budget, this place is perfect. I WILL be back!!

Reviews.Title: “Loved it, dont believe the hype”
Reviews.Author: dcarter15
Reviews.Content: I must admit that I was very nervous after I booked my vacation because of the reviews that I read online but after getting to the hotel and having a great time I have learned a new lesson that you shouldnt always believe what u read. I first arrived at the hotel to check in and the lobby was FULL of people checking in (which is a good sign in it self). The desk clerks were going as fast as they could, it didnt help that the guest that were checking in had all the questions in the world!!! It was finally my turn to check in, the young lady Jackie was still very friendly and helpful even though the people before me had 3 rooms and had about a million questions she still had some happiness for me. My checkin was very simple a few papers to sign, got my keys and parking pass and I was on my way. I had a oceanfront room which was great. I had a wonderful view of the beach, the pool and yeah yeah the Tiki Bar. Before I even unpacked I headed to the Tiki Bar. It was also packed down there but again to my surprise was another cheerful employee Kara. In my opinion she is the best bartender and makes a awesome Long Island. Finally I made it back to my room and just in time to get ready for the comedy show that they have on property. This was a wonderful weekend and I will be back more and more. Thanks to all the staff.

Reviews.Title: “Fitted us perfectly, We Loved it!!!”
Reviews.Author: Superstarr12
Reviews.Content: We stayed July 15-17. What a great choice!!! I booked the room online and was a little leery after reading negative comment and the fact that they couldn't find my reservation the day of but, it was all straightened out with the correct spelling of my last name. (Thanks front desk staff and lady with the pretty nails) For the price we paid this hotel exceeded our expectations. First off we had an oceanfront efficiency that overlooked the pool. When we checked in the room my sister and I stopped to take in the smell next we did our cleanliness inspection I must say the room passed. Since my sister and I don't get along well with bugs we did a bug inspection. Didn't find any!! I must say the hotel is dated but fitted my younger siblings.(18, 21, 22) What I didn't like was the slow hot elevators, shower curtain, lower parking deck,(even though I always found a park), and the old carpet(which I say the maid spray with something while she talked on her cell phone). Located across from Publix, Dollar Tree, Subway, Walgreens, ect…, Comedy club, Indoor heated pool, restaurant, discounts from places in town.

Reviews.Title: “Dirty - Stay Away!”
Reviews.Author: familytravel59
Reviews.Content: Pictures on the website hide everything. This place is nasty, dirty, moldy, pretty gross. Stay away. Arrived too late and had to stay. Checked out next day.

Reviews.Title: “Good Value, Great service”
Reviews.Author: rachsedd
Reviews.Content: Shopped around and while some facilities were a little nicer, the LaPlaya offered the best deal for the money. Stayed in Oceanfront efficiency and was satisfied with the service and room. Room was clean and was kept clean with daily maid service. No frills but then for 85 bucks per night was a good stay. Balconies overlooked the beach and the pool with deck and Tiki bar was great. The staff was very friendly and serving; we were very satisfied. In particular, Jackie I gave special attention to us in order to extend our stay as we wanted. Very personable staff, a good value pricing; good location on the strip and the beach; all in all it was a great stay.

Reviews.Title: “I LOVE THIS PLACE!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: kerryallen7
Reviews.Content: After a little bit of a "bumpy" start to my trip, I found that the LaPlaya in Daytona Beach became my home away from home! The front desk manager Willie was extremely accomodating, housekeeping kept the suite as neat as a pin....but BEST OF ALL was CHRISSY at the TIKI BAR!!!! She's not only one of the best bartenders Ive ever met (and Ive bartended for over 10 yrs), she's one of the coolest people Ive ever met! She not only comped me tickets to thier comedy club (which is a great place - and she also bartends there), but she single handedly made our vaca the best - and this was my 4th vaca in 6 wks - including a cruise!. The other bartenders are great too! I urge everyone that takes a vaca to Daytona to stay at the LaPlaya and go meet Chrissy for a Voodoo Juice!!!! :D

Reviews.Title: “One of the best values in town”
Reviews.Author: bearsman54
Reviews.Content: My family spent a week at The LaPlaya and we had a very nice stay. We have stayed there for the last 5 years and this was the best stay yet. The property does have some cosmetic issues but the excellent staff made up for this. The location is second to none, on the beach and accross from shopping and food. I would and have recommended this hotel to several of my coworkers and friends. A visit to the 10th floor comedy club is a most if you visit.

Reviews.Title: “KARA WAS AWESOME!!!”
Reviews.Author: glassntat
Reviews.Content: My wife and i stayed at your resort last week, and i must say, that we couldn't have picked a worst week to come! Due to the weather, we discussed not returning to daytona. Then about our third day in, we decided to go to the tiki bar for a drink. There, we met Kara!! Let me start by saying... The ONLY reason we will come back to daytona is her. The few times we saw her, made our trip very pleasurable. She is the nicest bartender we have met in a long time. You should be proud to have her as an employee!! Thank you again, and we shall return!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent for the price, all around great, would definately go back!!”
Reviews.Author: LaurieC_123
Reviews.Content: Was a little concerned with the mixed reviews but when we arrived, parking was fine, checked in at 4. Room was just what I requested upper floor directly above pool. Staff was friendly. Room was very clean...saw no bugs or anything that I thought was not up to par. Pool was cleaned every morning. Tiki bar was GREAT!! The hot tubs weren't operational but who needs a hot tub when you have the beach and a sparkling pool at your back door? I felt completely safe at this hotel and would definitely recommend it to anyone who is planning a trip to Daytona Beach..

Reviews.Title: “Roaches!”
Reviews.Author: Pineapplelove
Reviews.Content: Hotel is very dated. Room we stayed in needed new everything - carpet, appliances, etc. Could not leave anything out in the kitchenette or there would be roaches crawling around on it. Our four towels and a beach bag was stolen the first night on our chairs outside our room left there to dry. Had to buy ice the first 2 days of our 5 day stay for the 3 ice machines at the hotel did not work. On the plus side, the front desk staff was friendly and helpful. Would not stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Gross. Just Gross.”
Reviews.Author: Kerri315
Reviews.Content: I have been going to Daytona for over 30 years, so I know to expect "older" hotels. I did not however expect a "gross and disgusting for $100 a nite" hotel. Only reason we stayed the one night was we arrived too late to move. I would not let my little one touch anything...none of us took our shoes off...I could not sleep for fear of the mold coming up to get me. My husband wanted me to take a pic of the "booger" stuck to the bathroom wall but I could not get myself to do it. Sprayed perfume in the room to cover the mildew stench. We checked out first thing in the AM and management graciously moved us over to the Plaza Resort - can't believe the same company runs both places. Loved the Plaza. Will cringe every time we drive by the LaPlaya. (Shudder)

Reviews.Title: “loved it!”
Reviews.Author: dmasc
Reviews.Content: My husband and I wanted to get away for our 3rd year anniversary so we decided on Daytona Beach. We were looking for someplace affordable and found the perfect place! La Playa Resort on A1A! Even on a holiday weekend the price was affordable and we had a great time! We spent our day poolside and had delicious drinks at the tikibar. After relaxing in the sun we watched a great comedy show at Bonkerz located in the hotel which is very convenient. The staff was friendly and we left very happy. We cant wait to go back!

Reviews.Title: “We hated!!”
Reviews.Author: maggie1691
Reviews.Content: I booked a family weekend getaway. This is not for kids and the hotel don't look anything like photos. I would stay at the hotel if I was drunk and don't care about the smell. They also kept one night fee even know that we didn't stay.

Reviews.Title: “NO, NEVER STAY HERE!!!!”
Reviews.Author: my3sons4
Reviews.Content: It was a gift from a friend for my family and I to stay on the beach for the 4th of July 11. She booked through Expedia.com, and thought that she was getting a good deal and that the property was nice. Well, the only thing that looked nice was the outside and the lobby!!!!!! It wasn't a safe environment to have your children in. The floors seem like they were going to cave in and the carpet was from 1960. It looked dingy and like it had been shampooed forever leaving it looking wrinkled and worn out. The beds we sat on after I sprayed Lysol over everything was hard and uncomfortable. The balcony door you had to play with it to get it to open or close. The door to the room gave the feeling of someone kicking it in, it just was not secure enough. The front desk person didn't even acknowledge me for about 2 minutes standing there even though she looked up at me. Not a good place to go!! NEVER AGAIN!!!!! We were in the room for about 15 minutes before I was to the front desk trying to get another room or just cancel the whole thing.

Reviews.Title: “not what she used to be”
Reviews.Author: grouchee1
Reviews.Content: We were rather surprised this wekend, we have stayed here before and no issues. But..... not this time, after five requests in our four night stay they never repaired the shower drain, [should have let the kids over run the tub and flood]. contacted the front desk, they would tell you very politely that maint had been called. NEVER APPARENTLY MADE IT. The rooms are just like they were 10 years ago but really aged, refrigerator rusty,stove rusty,carpets were dirty, if you had white socks on they quickley were gray on the bottoms, as far as the rest of the room not that bad just aged. Still a great location on the beach, just lacking overall general cleaning and maint. although I will give credit to the staff we encountered they were all very polite. just not able to fix the drain.
