Guess they resort really does not care once they get your money, they are done. If there were any other resorts available after the first night we would have been long gone. [special events weekend].

Reviews.Title: “We loved it”
Reviews.Author: mitzeljim
Reviews.Content: We been coming to this hotel since 2000 we come down ever June for our son's birthday he won't go anywhere else. The Service is great. We were dishearted that the outside hot tubs were since out of order again this year.Kara the bartender at the Tiki Bar is a great employee for you very nice and John in your restaurant is great empolyee also. And it was cleaner then in the past except for big water bugs in our room which was 105. We be back again nexts year like clock work. Thankyou Sincerely James Mitzel & Family.

Reviews.Title: “Not at all what is shown on the website! We will never go back.”
Reviews.Author: Hco1311
Reviews.Content: The website makes Laplaya seem like a nice, clean, family oriented hotel. It is none of these things. Our family reserved three rooms, two regular rooms and one suite. All rooms were extremely outdated, which we could have lived with; however it was also filthy. The carpet in all three rooms was so dirty I was afraid to let my little boy crawl on the floor. We had leaking toilets, moldy ceiling tiles, dirty looking mattresses with hairs in the sheets, very dirty pool, loud, etc. Etc. Etc. We had booked a week at this Daytona hotel and checked out after one miserable night. Do not go!!!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Staff”
Reviews.Author: jenb3fan
Reviews.Content: We have been to The La Playa Inn and Suites several times in the past 5 years and every stay just keeps getting better. We unfortunately were only able to stay Saturday the 11th, and being as hot as it was, we spent most of the day at the Tiki Bar where Eli gave us his exceptional service. Can't wait to come back for a longer stay to see Chrissy, Kara, Joe and listen to DJ Kyle! Thanks La Playa!

Reviews.Title: “Love Layplaya! Wouldn't go anywhere else.”
Reviews.Author: StacyMagacy
Reviews.Content: I've stayed in this same hotel for at least 15 years on & off and have only had ninor issues that have been resolved right away. I love Daytona & me & my mother go the 3rd week in July almost every year now as do a lot of other regulars! Laplaya always gives me & my family great deals on ocean front rooms promised each year! Wouldn't stay anywhere else!

Reviews.Title: “If you want a place to Relax.. Forget this one! Very loud, & dirty Pool.”
Reviews.Author: Dreamsofriveriamaya
Reviews.Content: Booked this one on line, & unfortunately, didn't check trip Advisor like I usually do, as it was a spur of the moment get away. We were looking for a quiet relaxing time by the pool & the Beach. We got there.. & were told our rm wouldn't be available till 4!! We then went to check out the pool.. There were like 4 or 5 huge Mega speakers blasting cheesey 80's music like " we don't have to take our clothes off to have a good time", or Madonna's like a prayer".. SERIOUSLY!! Music so loud by the pool you couldn't even talk to someone next to you. Save the crappy music, let people bring their ipods. The Pool was also dirty, & the place was very run down. Thankfully, the front desk transfered me ( at an additional charge) to their sister property Plaza Resort. The Plaza Resort was significantly higher, but way worth the money. ( Although they too had obnoxious loud music by the pool) but a better location, & cleaner.

Reviews.Title: “NASCAR & MORE”
Reviews.Author: Barb3147
Reviews.Content: Had a good time! The hotel was great and got a good price. There was a shopping plaza across the street. Everytrhing was close to get to. We had an oceanfront room with a balcony to sit out and watch beautiful scenery. They had a tiki bar with music. They had a regular pool and a little one for children. The had a parking garage. Our room had a kitchen sink, refrigerator, stove, microwave...who could ask for more? We went to the Daytona 500, went to Mardi Gras in Cocoa Beach, saw the space shuttle launch off into space, went to beautiful St. Augustine...nothing more than about an hour from our hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great Deal, Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Happynapper
Reviews.Content: My family and I spent Memorial weekend here and had a great time. This place was great for the price, right on the beach and the pool was great for the kids. The rooms are clean and the service was excellent. I will recommend this hotel to everyone I know.

Reviews.Title: “The place to be!”
Reviews.Author: CrazyLatin
Reviews.Content: We loved the location of LaPlaya Hotel, close to restaurants, shopping, BEACH side and especially loved the Tiki Bar. Atmosphere was light, warm and so enjoyable! with the comedy club in the same hotel, was a deffinite treat!!! We'll deffinitely be returning. We had such a great time. And we thank you for that.

Reviews.Title: “Worth what we paid”
Reviews.Author: maef
Reviews.Content: I booked the room for a great rate on a website that rated it a 3.5, and then was crushed to see bad reviews on other sites. I was expecting the worst and was pleasantly surprised. Yes, the fixtures are old and the carpet is thread-bare in a few places, but the efficiency was roomy, the kitchen completely separate from the rest of the room. Everything was clean and the staff were extremely helpful and pleasant. It's not the Hilton...but either is the price. I would stay again - definitely.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay!!!!!!1”
Reviews.Author: treyster12
Reviews.Content: I recently spent my 25th anniversary with my Husband at the LaPlaya Resort. We booked with Hotels.com and we got a 1st floor room and we really wanted to stay up a few floors, so all we did was ask to be moved and they put us in the suite on the 6th floor. It was great!!! Beautiful view, great room (a little outdated, but I was not staying at the Hilton) but overall a great room.... Very clean and the people at the front was very accomadating.... A lot of people was talking about the room being outdated, but if you look, none of the motels on the beach can change their furniture every year. So, I had a very enjoyable stay and would recommend this hotel to anyone. And yes, I will be back again in the future.

Reviews.Title: “Never Again!!”
Reviews.Author: shcamck
Reviews.Content: Stayed here like I have many times before. The deck is worn and I tripped several times on uneven boards. The whole place needs much work and is not clean at all. The dj is more concerned about his visitors than being at work. Tiki bar was very nice if you could find a seat that wasn't broken. The beds are worn out. There is no outside Jacuzzi working and hasnt been for 2 years now. I found a new place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Got much more than we paid for”
Reviews.Author: tfraser3
Reviews.Content: This place is great , from the staff , to sheltered parking , laundry facilities , beach front , separate kitchen . indoor pool which you never find in Florida . beautiful outdoor pool , the tiki bar , music .. etc .....

Reviews.Title: “Good location”
Reviews.Author: luvthesun6
Reviews.Content: My family and I stayed at this hotel for a weekend get away . The scenery and service were both great. It was also very conveniently located on the beach which the kids just loved. The rooms were clean and beds were comfy. The husband and I enjoyed our days by the pool and the Tiki bar was great! I would definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Horrible”
Reviews.Author: jorgeae
Reviews.Content: I have never stayed in such a horrible, run down, and dirty place as the La Playa Resort in Daytona Beach. I'm unfortunately, very disatisfied with La Playa Resort and with Bookit.com, and this is because they misrepresent the quality of the La Playa Resort in Daytona Beach, FL. I have been ripped off and lied to by Bookit.com and by La Playa Resort. They are not a professional service basically ruined my vacation with my kids. La Playa Resort is listed and misrepresented by them and by Bookit.com as a 3.5 Star resort. And they know very well that this property does not qualify even for 2 Stars. The property is dilapidated, broken, small, unsafe and plain ugly. It would never even come close to a 2 star category. How can they even think that it would qualify as such and misrepresent it to customers. Here are just some of the problems we found: broken door jams; peeling paint off the walls inside the rooms and throughout the property; dirty and stained floors in the public areas; broken fixtures; clogged toilet; slow drain in bathroom sink; smelly blankets and sheets; stained and old bed covers; broken door locks; clumpy paint job - painted over old paint over and over again; dirty stained lounge and pool chairs; broken vandalized vending machines; broken window glass; and much more. This hotel is a disgrace and they should never be advertising it as a 3.5 Star, it would never, never qualify even close to that. Through this experience I have been cheated and lied to by your Bookit.com and by La Playa Resort and I doubt that I will ever trust their services again. My kids and my vacation experience was truly ruined by trusting Bookit.com and La Playa resort with our vacation plans. I traveled all the way from Afghanistan to have some time with my kids and enjoy a nice Florida vacation but our vacation was ruined by the truly negative experience of this run down hotel which misrepresents it facilities and it's quality to unsuspecting and hard working customers like me. I was cheated by both Bookit.com and by La Playa resort/hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Stay away no matter how good of a deal it looks like!”
Reviews.Author: Omonyja
Reviews.Content: This hotel was a result of a 'Name your price' offer on priceline and as a consequence of this experience, I will never be naming my price again. Sometimes, it's just not worth the money saved. Arriving in the room, it looked old and unmaintained. The rug had so much wear and tear and it looked liked like the carpet was many years old. The kitchenette was ok, and the beds were not terrible. The balcony gave a decent view of the garbage. Water from the airconditioners above was dripping onto the balcony as well. Arriving back to the hotel at about 1am, we were greeted by an entire family of roaches in the bathroom. This was the final straw. So at 1am, even though I had only been there for a few hours and I knew I couldn't get a refund for the 3 days I paid for, I checked out and found another hotel. Trust me, this is the worst hotel in world... or at least, the worst in Daytona... STAY AWAY!

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Beach Location-”
Reviews.Author: Vacationeer519
Reviews.Content: Perfect location. Perfect room. Perfect service. You can walk right out to the beach from the hotel. The indoor and outdoor pools were GREAT! They give you coupons and comps for the Tiki Bar!!! def not a place to stay if you want peace and quiet on your vacation. There is a live DJ there from sun up to sundown which we loved. Very family friendly! Best value for the money. I was skeptical because of the mixed review but was pleasantly surprised when I arrived. We have already booked two more trips to this same hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Needs some serious work.”
Reviews.Author: Jeenavan77
Reviews.Content: Nice location. That's probably the only good thing.. Oh and the tiki bar outside. Other than that I would NOT recommend this hotel to anyone. Might as well stay in a motel down the street. Most likely the same room and service. Leaky facet in shower and horrible bathrooms.. Not what I expected at all. Wish I would have researched a bit more.

Reviews.Title: “This Place Sucks!”
Reviews.Author: mhalcomb
Reviews.Content: Check in time was 4pm, room not ready yet, here's a parking pass and feel free to walk around. Never mind the fact that I just paid to stay at the hotel, now my car does also? Checked out the indoor pool, so much chlorine that it cleared our sinuses and bleached our clothes just standing there. Walls have cracks in them, there are chucks of the building missing, oh wait, there's a "tiki bar" out by the pool. It's nice taking a 13, 7, and 5 year old to a pool where they here "make sure you strap one on" coming from the speakers, and the DJ saying "Ya wanna see what happens when you have too much to drink at the beach? These girls are about to show us!" Wood is warped and rotten and needs paint. 4:30p, still no room. Sit in the car, drive down the road, 5pm, still no room. Finally get our room, after the first one on the second floor opened right to the tiki bar. Placed on the 7th floor. Had to shoulder tackle the front door to get it open, looks to me like the whole door is coming off its hinges. Appliances are 20 years old, room smells musty, fridge is dirty....a knock on the door. Maintenance man, here to fix your tub. What? Housekeeping said the handle was off the bath nozzle. 5 minutes later, it's still leaking, have to put a new rubber insert in, be back in 30 minutes to 1 hour. Next day, still broken. Great view of the tiki bar, supposed to close at 11pm, music still playing at 2am, on top of neighboring room doors slamming and hearing what was happening down the hall. Let's not forget the dead bugs clinging to the ceiling. Paint peeling from the balcony railing. Oh yeah, the balcony door won't shut unless you slam it. Need ice, there are ice machines on the 3rd, 5th, 7th, and 9th floors...never mind the fact that none of them work...and you don't know until you've taken the elevator all the way to the top. Paid for parking, came back to hotel and one spot left. I wonder what happened to the guest that arrived after us that had no place to park. Did I forget anything?

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Livi2899
Reviews.Content: I have no idea what these people are talking about!!! This place is da bomb! ;D I had such a great time. The staff is fun, they played with us WHILE they were cleaning! They cleaned even though we didn't ask them to! And the location is very convenient because theres an outlet across the street that everyone walks to. The pool is always really warm. ( the indoor one. ) and the hot tub is amazing.[: It's right on the beach do you can walk up and down the beach all the time!!

Reviews.Title: “Nice pool area!”
Reviews.Author: cblvsws
Reviews.Content: I traveled with my three children down for spring break! Service at the front desk (John) was great! Rooms are average. Loved the kitchen area, which was seperate from the sleeping area. Beds were comfy.....pretty quiet for spring break! Pool area was nice. Could sit on the deck and watch kids play volleyball on the beach or in the pool. Nice Tiki bar too..... and the music was nice too..would stay again!

Reviews.Title: “DON'T DO IT!! LISTEN TO REVIEWS!!!”
Reviews.Author: brynn272002
Reviews.Content: I decided to not listen to reviews and give it a whirl...worst mistake of my life. We stayed for four days and not because we wanted to but because everyday we tried to get out of it but there was never anyone working that was supposedly authorized to give our money back. Every day they told us to come back in the morning because their supervisor would be there to complain to but every morning nobody could do anything. Finally the last day they told us they couldn't do anything because we waited till the last day to say anything. I have never been so angry. The hallway to the lobby smelt like rotten garbage and the the ceiling was leaking so bad and all they were doing to help the mess was to lay down mattress pads to sop it it. Our first day there, i stepped on one nail out of about 20 that were visible from a tack strip not covered going into the bathroom. The floor was so stained and dirty I would not let my children take their shoes off. The ceiling was falling apart all over our beds, luggage, and floor every time we opened the stained dirty shades. The appliances were all rusted out and still dirty. There was blacks hairs on the plates in the cupboards. The fridge was leaking water so every time we opened it water spilled out. When we pulled the bedspreads off (i always bring my own) the sheets were still dirty from the previous guest. After we complained the first day, they switched us to the room next door. It was better but the floor was still gross and stained, those sheets as well were dirty (i could tell because there were no fold marks in the sheets from being folded, just all wrinkled from being slept in) When they brought clean folded sheets, they still stunk ( they should smell like bleach). Our keys for this room never worked, maintenance was having to let us into our room after several trips to the front desks. People partying till 4am blowing their blow horns right outside our door and even after complaining from midnight til 3am, security did nothing. the covered parking deck leaked so much water we thought it was going to cave in. People constantly dealing and doing drugs in the parking garage. Walked into the laundry room with my 8yr old to find a couple in there having sex. Her pimp clearing watching guard because he told us we couldn't go in there but i did any way because my clothes were in the dryer. Told front desk and security where they were and they did nothing. The housekeeper never once while we were there cleaned our bathroom, or did any cleaning for that matter. My daughter had an accident so i stripped the bed down for the housekeeper and when we came back to our room, we noticed she had put the same soiled bedding back down. That was the last straw, tried to get our money back to get out of there and they told us in the morning they could help us out. But in the morning they told us they couldn't do anything because we waited til our last morning. We went next door to the Grand seas which was amazing. Their three pools were clean and not all rusted out, their four hot tubs were working and the rooms and bedding were clean. The staff was nice and helpful and clean. DON'T STAY THERE!! I would wait in line in the lobby for an hour listening to other guests' complaints just to be able to voice mine which they clearly could have cared less about. It is disgusting and the health department should shut it down. Trashy trashy and I still feel gross even after being 1500 miles away from it. There is no going back after staying there. You will be mad at yourself.

Reviews.Title: “Best Tiki Bar in Daytona Beach”
Reviews.Author: yankeebob
Reviews.Content: I was invited by some friends for a drink at LaPlaya and was completly surprised. Our bartender( I believe, Chrissie) was great. She was able to direct us to just about anywhere in Daytona and made us feel at home. The rooms were a bit outdated as most in Daytona Beach are...right out of the art deco period.

Reviews.Title: “Rude desk clerks”
Reviews.Author: catoosa
Reviews.Content: The two male check in staff was very rude and not accomodating. The stay was nice but the initial encounter with desk clerks was a turn off from the start. The two did not want to be nice to us at all. Other guests were experiencing the same thing.

Reviews.Title: “I pay attention to Detail, therfor, this Hotel was very beneath me!!!”
Reviews.Author: lenalove
Reviews.Content: For starters, I pay attention to detail, so the Carpet was Horribly nasty, I traveled with my family, a 9 yr old and a 2 year old, and I didn't want my two year old to get on the floor at all, without shoes, that was a hard thing to do.The curtins look as though they came off of "That 70's show", the bath tub rail was hanging on by thread, and the Indoor pool was Nasty, cigarette butts in the so-called flower pots and water everywhere. I so wanted to leave a day early it was so bad, but we wouldn't have gotten our money back, I was to the point that I didn't even care about the money. I could go on some more, but I won't, I would just advise, Don't Stay Here!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Motel Hell!!”
Reviews.Author: ADivasadvice
Reviews.Content: The resort had the worst rooms, with dirty carpets, small beds, leaking bathroom ceiling, and a terrible dj service! The beds were small, and very uncomfortable. I felt as if I were staying in the motels that you have to bring your own sheets to be safe. The only positive was it was located directly on the beachfront. Now about the dj service, for this to be spring break and "all spring breakers are welcome", the service could not keep an audience. The played one good song, then bored you with another. I thought I was in a convalescent home. Drinks were ok at the Tikki bar. Overall, don't let the "resort" title encourage you. Cost is the same if you go a few hotels up the strip, with better accommadations.. Thumbs Down..

Reviews.Title: “Never Again!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: unhappy0120
Reviews.Content: If I could go back in time and choses where I was staying for my much needed vacation with my husband and his family I would. But unfortunately I could not. It was so much better looking from the outside and the lobby then what it was inside the room's. I wish that we would have looked at reviews before we made reservations there. When you are looking to stay in a 2 bedroom suite you expect it to be 2 rooms not one where you pull a bed down from the wall. And from the money that we paid to be there is a fresh coat of paint so you dont see water damage on the walls or ceiling to much to ask for. I would never again stay there, or send my worst enemy ever to stay there either.

Reviews.Title: “Stay if you want to die”
Reviews.Author: BestGrandmother
Reviews.Content: If you think about going to this hotel you will surely end up inside of a morgue. The police seriously need to get involved this hotel is BAD. The service needs some good therapy especially the psyco maids.

Reviews.Title: “not very nice”
Reviews.Author: ceo637
Reviews.Content: this place needs a complete renovation. it is run down. you can tell that it has been partied at pretty hard. it would be good if you were on spring break and just wanted to party but other than that its no good. there were cockroaches in our room so we had to put all our luggage up off the floor. the beds were not comfy. the indoor pool and hot tub were ok, pool nice and heated hot tub small but it closes at 9. the out door pool is open later but is not heated and was way to cold to swin in. they might as well just drain it beacuse no one could use it at that temp. the 2 out door hot tubs are closed and it doesn not appear that they are planning on re opening them they need to change their web site to reflect this. the pool deck and location right on the beach are the best things about this place. oh and they charge their guests $5 a day to park. i would not stay here again

Reviews.Title: “motor cycle trip”
Reviews.Author: BillMarj
Reviews.Content: The LaPlaya was a mystery hotel and it turned out to be great. Nice parking for the Harley', under cover. Hotel was clean ans we had an ocean and city view. Desk was great with us and helped get everyone together as far as rooms.

HotelInfo.Name: LaPlaya Resort
HotelInfo.Address: 2500 N Atlantic Ave, Daytona Beach, FL 32118
